messages.title: Standing with Theresa May
messages.content:
Hello again, 
I didn't expect to be writing to you again so soon! But I think Theresa May was right to call a general election for 8th June. As we begin Brexit negotiations with the EU, the country needs a strong and stable leadership. Since the EU vote to back Britain, she deserves the strongest possible mandate.

messages.title: Personal Health Update
messages.content: Some of you know that I have been out of action having chemotherapy for non-Hodgkin's lymphoma. I have now completed treatment and I am glad to say the cancer has been eradicated. But I am afraid the doctors tell me too much very soon, so will not be campaigning before 8th June so please email me on [email]

messages.title: Local Health Services
messages.content: In the last years I have had two main priorities: to ensure that the local train service between Grantham, Stamford and London is retained; and to get United Lincolnshire Hospitals Trust to reopen Grantham A&E at nights. That is why I left hospital in a wheelchair to vote for Article 50, and why I marched on a demonstration with the Prime Minister to discuss the unacceptable situation at Grantham hospital.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support Theresa May in getting the best deal for Britain as we leave the European Union and to back Theresa May to protect local health services.
Reopen Grantham A&E at nights and ensure local train services are retained.
Back measures to continue economic support which have cut unemployment to its lowest level for decades.

issues.brexitEurope: Support Theresa May in getting the best deal for Britain as we leave the European Union.
issues.economy: Back measures to continue economic support which have cut unemployment to its lowest level for decades.
issues.health: Protect local health services; reopen Grantham A&E at nights.

leaflet.personalStatement: I promise to support Theresa May in getting the best deal for Britain as we leave the European Union and to back Theresa May to protect local health services; support superb local schools; and back measures to continue economic support which have cut unemployment to its lowest level for decades.

politicalExperience.achievements: Priority has been ensuring local train service is retained and pushing to reopen Grantham A&E at nights.

contactInformation.address: Grantham & Stamford Conservatives, 62 North Street, Bourne, PE10 9AJ

images.caption: NICK BOLES standing with Theresa May
